docs.abstract: Dr F Homburger lr proposes that antismoking forces and cigarette indus work together to develop safer cigarette as alternative to complete cessation of smoking; holds cigarette indus should concede there is link between heavy smoking and lung cancer and antismoking groups should concede that smoking is important to emotional health of great many people

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Publicity against cigarette smoking has recently increased, TV commercials for cigarettes have been discontinued, editorials have commented on the anniversary of the Surgeon General's report on smoking and health and a report has been issued by the Royal College of Physicians, London, entitled "Smoking and Health Now."
